text: Judeopolonia is an antisemitic conspiracy theory claiming that Jews seek to take over Poland. * * * * * ==Origin== The false claim is said to have originated from a book published by Polish writer Julian Ursyn Niemcewicz in 1858. In 1912, Teodor Jeske-Choi≈Ñski, another Polish writer, reportedly promoted the false claim in the form of an imaginary quote: "If you do not allow us to establish a 'Judeo-Polonia state' and a nation of 'Judeo-Polish people,' we will strangle you." ==Related pages== * Racism in Poland * Antisemitic stereotypes * Anti-Judaism and antisemitism * The Protocols of the Elders of Zion ==References== Category:Racism Category:Antisemitism Category:Disinformation Category:Conspiracy theories Category:Antisemitism in Europe
title: Judeopolonia
